name: Ann Luttrell
text: Great pizza kid meals.  Great price.

name: 383 S Barracuda
text: Awesome pizza!!! Got the meat lovers pan.The new crust is really good. They were real busy, but got us in and out quickly. Food came out fast. Cooked perfectly.

name: Jennifer Terry
text: We actually hadn't been here in awhile. We really liked it. The food was good, all the staff was friendly, not just our waiter. We had a spilled soda and they took care of it right away and brought out a new one. Nice atmosphere. We were able to stay beyond our meal, chatting without being rushed out.

name: Ed Bruno
text: Pizza Hut isn't really pizza, but it's still good. This restaurant is better run than other franchises. The staff is friendly. I'll go again.

name: LaLa Smith
text: THIS IS NOT PIZZA HUT! This is now called BONELESS CRISPY CHICKEN HNT CHICKEN

name: Tim Mendenhall
text: Pizza was good, but in no way was it a large I've had bigger pizzas from all the other places I've been and I travel a good distance for some of my work. If you want to feed a family of 4 you will need 2 or more Pizzas depending on how much â€¦More

name: Leandro Rodrigues
text: I do not recommend.  They are a shame, I went with my family on Sunday, when it came time to pay the bill they passed my card twice, and I just signed a receipt, but still it attracted twice the amount.  I already complained and they did not solve.

name: Sheila Wilson
text: Pizza is always hot and good.  Love the breadsticks.

name: Adj Sna
text: Amazing place to dine with the little onesðŸ˜€ always leave pleased with our service and food. We also order from them and they are always on time and food taste like it just came out of the got oven. Great customer service and very clean.

name: Brianna Morales
text: If a restaurant is open until 10 they should be.  I called at 9 and no one answered.   I called for 15 minutes straight and no one answered the phone.  They also disabled ordering online.  This is probably why mist pizza huts have already closed down.   Terrible customer service

text: The restaurant needs some updating and cosmetic work, and the service is friendly, but slow. Overall, Pizza Hut is not known for their dine in service so it doesn't really matter. The pizza and food quality is decent. There are better pizza shops in Oxford.

text: It is a Pizza Hut, so the food is pretty much the same as at every other pizza hut.  This location has been recently renovated and provides a nice decor and environment.  The staff is friendly and fast.  3 stars due to them messing up â€¦More
